snippet: The Dallas Cowboys’ overtime victory against the Pittsburgh Steelers in an N.F.C.-A.F.C. matchup cast perhaps the biggest shadow on the murky playoff picture.
abstract: Judy Battista On Pro Football column observes that on most compelling day of 2012 NFL season, when six games paired winning teams--latest on the calendar that has ever happened--it was non-division games that provided the most intrigue, even in their non-competitiveness, and cast the most shadow onto a murky playoff picture.
lead_paragraph: The Dallas Cowboys’ overtime victory against the Pittsburgh Steelers in an N.F.C.-A.F.C. matchup cast perhaps the biggest shadow on the murky playoff picture.

headline.seo: N.F.L.’s Nondivision Games Most Pivotal of Week 15
headline.main: A Playoff Chase Full of Falls, Rises and Surprises
headline.print_headline: A Playoff Chase Full of Falls, Rises and Surprises
